summary: Analyzed Metalogic/ (12,545 lines, 42 files). Main theorems proven: soundness (sorry-free), BMCS completeness (sorry-free core), FMP completeness (sorry-free internal). 31 sorries remain, mostly in FDSM modal saturation. Identified archival candidates (deprecated saturation code, blocked bridge code) and naming improvements. Algebraic/ ready for future work.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive analysis of Metalogic module structure, main theorems, sorries, archival candidates, and refactoring recommendations

partial_progress.details: Research report completed with module inventory, theorem status, sorry analysis, and 4-phase refactoring plan
